name: TinyAttack.com - free-to-play, turn-based strategy game
description:
TinyAttack.com is a free-to-play, player-vs-player turn-based strategy game that can be played in any web browser, inspired by games like Advance Wars and Weewar.

Our top priorities building this game:

  • Free to play (No ads, and no pay-to-win mechanics)
  • Easily start a game with anyone
  • Play at your own pace
  • No app or software to download

There are 5 things you can do during your turn:

  • Build - Click or tap on a base that is under your control (your team color) and build a unit. You can only build units you can afford. You'll earn coins each round and for each base you control.
  • Move - Units can move 1-6 spaces based on the terrain and type of unit. Units can move then attack, move or attack and others can move, attack, and move again.
  • Attack - Each unit can cause different amounts of damage depending on the unit type and the terrain it is on. If multiple of your units attack the same enemy unit bonus damage is inflicted.
  • Capture - Soldiers and hovercrafts can capture bases. Move one of these units to a base and click/tap once to begin capturing the base. If your unit survives until your next turn the base is yours! You can start building units and earning coins for your new base.
  • Heal - If you decide not to move or attack with a unit you can heal. Tap on the unit and look for a blue heal button to appear below the map next to the unit stats. Healing amounts vary by unit. Air units can not heal.

Once you are done commanding your army click End Turn. Your opponent will be notified it is their turn.
